Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Northbound Reroute near Cottage Grove/75th
ShortDescription: Northbound 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 76th, Greenwood and South Chicago: due to, street blockage near Cottage Grove/75th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 76th, Greenwood, South Chicago and over regular route, due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/75th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #87 87th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 87th/Baltimore
ShortDescription: Eastbound 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Houston, 90th, Buffalo and 91st: due to, street blockage near87th/Baltimore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Houston, 90th, Buffalo and 91st: due to, street blockage near87th/Baltimore.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Subway Trains Rerouted to Elevated Tracks
ShortDescription: Red Line subway trains are rerouted to the elevated lines between Fullerton and Cermak-Chinatown due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line subway trains are rerouted to the elevated lines between Fullerton and Cermak-Chinatown due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

We apologize for the inconvenience and are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Red Line service to 95th/Dan Ryan

After stopping at Fullerton, 95th-bound trains will be diverted and will make the following elevated station stops:

  • Armitage (accessible)
  • Sedgwick (accessible)
  • Chicago (at Franklin; accessible)
  • Merchandise Mart (accessible)
  • Clark/lake (accessible)
  • State/Lake
  • Washington/Wabash (accessible)
  • Adams/Wabash
  • Roosevelt (elevated station west of Wabash; accessible)

Then, trains will stop at Cermak-Chinatown and make all normal stops to 95th/Dan Ryan.

Red Line service to Howard

For service toward Howard, after stopping at Cermak-Chinatown, trains will then be diverted to the above-listed elevated stations, in the opposite order, through Armitage and then make all normal stops from Fullerton to Howard.

For service in areas away from where the Red Line is running

Consider using local bus alternatives through the area where you're traveling, including those to other train lines or where Red Line service has been rerouted to operate.
